name: Burgundy CMS
tagline: Lightweight CMS in progress. Written in PHP.
body:
### Lightweight. Fast. User Friendly.
Burgundy CMS is being written from scratch in PHP to be lightweight, fast and user friendly.
Stay tuned for updates. This project is still in the **very** early stages of development.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
